quote: Life is inherently risky. There is only one big risk you should avoid at all costs—and that is the risk of doing nothing.
Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
In the long run, we shape our lives, and we shape ourselves. The process never ends until we die.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
We do not remember days; we remember moments.
The best way to predict your future is to create it.
You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
You can’t cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Challenges are what make life interesting; overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
The only journey is the one within.
Don’t count the days; make the days count.
The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
An unexamined life is not worth living.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It goes on.
To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive.
Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
The greatest use of life is to spend it for something that will outlast it.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
You alone are enough. You have nothing to prove to anybody.
Find out who you are and do it on purpose.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
The most wasted of days is one without laughter.
If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way.
Learn as if you will live forever, live like you will die tomorrow.
When you change your thoughts, remember to also change your world.
Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterward.
Just one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day.
If you can dream it, you can do it.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there someday.
Whatever you are, be a good one.
The past is never dead. It’s not even past.
The strongest of all warriors are these two—Time and Patience.
Beware; for I am fearless, and therefore powerful.
To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
It’s no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
Life is to be lived, not controlled; and humanity is won by continuing to play in face of certain defeat.
I know not all that may be coming, but be it what it will, I’ll go to it laughing.
If you tell the truth you do not need a good memory.
Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity or registering wrongs.
It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.
The true courage is in facing danger when you are afraid.
Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You.
Never hurry and never worry!
The thing is—fear can’t hurt you any more than a dream.
When we love, we always strive to become better than we are.
All humans make mistakes. What determines a person’s character aren’t the mistakes we make. It’s how we take those mistakes and turn them into lessons.
The wound is the place where the light enters you.
The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.
Simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
Grown-ups never understand anything by themselves, and it is tiresome for children to be always and forever explaining things to them.
No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
Wisdom cannot be imparted. Wisdom that a wise man attempts to impart always sounds like foolishness to someone else.
The truth is rarely pure and never simple.
The events in our lives happen in a sequence in time, but in their significance to ourselves they find their own order.
The time is always right to do what is right.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
Life is not a spectator sport.
If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one.
The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the little voice at the end of the day that says I'll try again tomorrow.
Everything you want is on the other side of fear.
The difference between winning and losing is most often not quitting.
You have power over your mind—not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
It takes a deep commitment to change and an even deeper commitment to grow.
My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
Be a bush if you can't be a tree. If you can't be a highway, just be a trail. If you can't be a sun, be a star.
